error_deleting_deck: An error occurred while deleting the deck.
get_started_create_deck: Get started by creating your first deck.
no_flashcard_decks: You don't have any flashcard decks yet. Create a new deck to start studying!
flashcards_tooltip: Need flashcards? The chat can help you create ready-to-study flashcards in seconds. Example query: "Generate 10 flashcards that will help me prepare for a math exam."
deck_has_no_flashcards: This deck doesn't contain any flashcards yet.
completed_flashcards: You have completed all flashcards in this deck.
error_generic: Sorry, an error occurred. Please try again later.
confirm_delete_description: Are you sure you want to delete this conversation? This action cannot be undone.
error_provide_deck_and_flashcards: Please provide a deck name and questions and answers for each flashcard.
question: Question
modern_homepage_title: Here your learning begins and ends
modern_homepage_subtitle: Connect the world of exams, flashcards, and intelligent chat in one place.
modern_homepage_intro_text: With AI, you can create exams or flashcards in seconds, and our system will help you prepare effectively.
homepage_modern_section_text1: Create flashcards and test yourself in an enjoyable way, learning efficiently.
homepage_modern_section_text2: Our intelligent chat generates tasks, tests, and flashcards in seconds, tailored to your needs.
homepage_modern_section_text3: Mix and match materials to best fit your study plan.
modern_homepage_highlights_subtitle: Discover the benefits of our tool:
homepage_modern_highlight1: Use files from notes and books to create flashcards in a blink.
homepage_modern_highlight2: Easily organize your study plan before the exam.
homepage_modern_highlight3: Gain instant answers and clear explanations of difficult topics.
modern_homepage_bonus_text: Check out the test module to verify your knowledge and improve your grades.
upload_instructions: Please provide a description and category before uploading the file.
error_upload_file: An error occurred while uploading the file.
error_delete_file: An error occurred while deleting the file.
get_started_create_test: Get started by creating a new exam.
feedback_thanks: Thank you for submitting your feedback!
form_error: An error occurred while sending the message.
source_question: How did you hear about our site?
features_rating_question: How would you rate the current features of our site?
likes_features_question: Which of the following features do you like the most? Do you have any suggestions for improving them?
new_feature_question: Do you have an idea for a new feature that could improve our site? If so, please provide a detailed description.
nps_question: How likely are you to recommend our site to friends or colleagues?
usability_question: How easy was it for you to find what you were looking for on our site?

features_list.File saving: File saving and access in chat
features_list.Statistics: Progress statistics and analysis (work in progress)

features_improvement_suggestions: Do you have any suggestions for improving the selected features?
suggestion_placeholder: Please provide your suggestions for improving the selected features
select_flashcards_file: Choose a CSV or APKG file with flashcards
feedback_description: Your feedback is very important to us. Thank you for your time!

future_plans.title: Future Plans
future_plans.description: Here are our future plans aimed at further enhancing your learning experience:

items.title: Creating a mobile application
items.description: Access our tools on smartphones and tablets so you can study wherever you are.

items.title: Tracking and analyzing your learning progress
items.description: Monitor your achievements and receive reports on the effectiveness of your learning.

items.title: Pomodoro Timer to track study time
items.description: Manage your time effectively using the Pomodoro method.

items.title: Guides on how to fully utilize the potential of this site
items.description: Gain knowledge on how to best use our tools to maximize your results.

items.title: Mini blog with information about updates, changes, and various topics related to effective learning, memorization, time management, and similar subjects.
items.description: Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and advice on effective learning.
